nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member RPN calculator is called.
nml_option.possible_values: .true. or .false.

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.
nml_option.possible_values: .true. or .false.

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member output occurs on start-up.
nml_option.possible_values: .true. or .false.

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Interval that determines frequency of computation for the RPN calculator analysis member.
nml_option.possible_values: Any valid time stamp, 'output_interval', or 'dt'.

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of stream the RPN calculator analysis member put output fields.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or the name of an output stream

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_variable_a
nml_option.description: Name of a 0D or 1D real field that is bound to name 'a' in an RPN expression.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or the name of a valid MPAS 0D or 1D real field

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_variable_b
nml_option.description: Name of a 0D or 1D real field that is bound to name 'b' in an RPN expression.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or the name of a valid MPAS 0D or 1D real field

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_variable_c
nml_option.description: Name of a 0D or 1D real field that is bound to name 'c' in an RPN expression.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or the name of a valid MPAS 0D or 1D real field

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_variable_d
nml_option.description: Name of a 0D or 1D real field that is bound to name 'd' in an RPN expression.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or the name of a valid MPAS 0D or 1D real field

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_variable_e
nml_option.description: Name of a 0D or 1D real field that is bound to name 'e' in an RPN expression.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or the name of a valid MPAS 0D or 1D real field

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_variable_f
nml_option.description: Name of a 0D or 1D real field that is bound to name 'f' in an RPN expression.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or the name of a valid MPAS 0D or 1D real field

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_variable_g
nml_option.description: Name of a 0D or 1D real field that is bound to name 'g' in an RPN expression.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or the name of a valid MPAS 0D or 1D real field

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_variable_h
nml_option.description: Name of a 0D or 1D real field that is bound to name 'h' in an RPN expression.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or the name of a valid MPAS 0D or 1D real field

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_expression_1
nml_option.description: An RPN expression using fields bound to variable names.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or a valid RPN expression described in the documentation

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_expression_2
nml_option.description: An RPN expression using fields bound to variable names.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or a valid RPN expression described in the documentation

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_expression_3
nml_option.description: An RPN expression using fields bound to variable names.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' or a valid RPN expression described in the documentation

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_expression_4
nml_option.description: An RPN expression using fields bound to variable names.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none or a valid RPN expression described in the documentation

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_output_name_1
nml_option.description: The name of the output field resulting from RPN expression 1.
nml_option.possible_values: a valid MPAS field output name if expression 1 is set, otherwise 'none'

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_output_name_2
nml_option.description: The name of the output field resulting from RPN expression 2.
nml_option.possible_values: a valid MPAS field output name if expression 2 is set, otherwise 'none'

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_output_name_3
nml_option.description: The name of the output field resulting from RPN expression 3.
nml_option.possible_values: a valid MPAS field output name if expression 3 is set, otherwise 'none'

nml_option.name: config_AM_rpnCalculator_output_name_4
nml_option.description: The name of the output field resulting from RPN expression 4.
nml_option.possible_values: a valid MPAS field output name if expression 4 is set, otherwise 'none'

package.name: rpnCalculatorAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables requires for the RPN calculator analysis member.
